definition: a military operation (often involving new supplies of men and materiel) to strengthen a military force or aid in the performance of its mission
details:
noun
- a military operation (often involving new supplies of men and materiel) to strengthen a military force or aid in the performance of its mission
= synonyms: support
- an act performed to strengthen approved behavior
= synonyms: reward
- a device designed to provide additional strength
= synonyms: strengthener
- (psychology) a stimulus that strengthens or weakens the behavior that produced it
= synonyms: reinforcing stimulus
- information that makes more forcible or convincing
= example: information that makes more forcible or convincing
= synonyms: reenforcement
